title: Heritage Downtown Baltimore City Break near Inner Harbour
description: At the junction of preserved Gilded Age luxury and heritage charm, Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore Inner Harbour, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect base to discover one of Americaâ€™s fascinating east coast cities. Located just moments from the Patapsco River harbour, this grand hotel hides countless treasures, including shining chandeliers, sweeping marble staircases and B&O American Brasserie, which serves elegant charcuterie and handcrafted cocktails every evening.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore Inner Harbor, an IHG Hotel

title: Baltimore Luxe Escape on Iconic Recreation Pier
description: Baltimore's vibrant history and tranquil personality collide in the sophisticated Sagamore Pendry Baltimore, located in a memorable 1914 property on the iconic Recreation Pier. This luxurious hotel pays homage to the quintessential Baltimore essence with bespoke antique decorations, warm hospitality, and even a whiskey bar named after the 17th-century cannons discovered under the pier - a true place of reimagined tradition.
